Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.weapons

Class Attack

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.weapons.Attack
  • public class Attack
extends java.lang.Object
    This class schematizes an attack, which is the effect that a weapon has on one or more targets

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private java.util.List<ActionConfig> actionConfigs
      The configurations of this attack
      private boolean basicFirst
      true if this attack needs the basic attack to be executed before it, false otherwise
      protected Board board
      The Board this attack can be executed on
      protected java.util.List<Coin> cost
      The cost of this attack in Coin
      protected java.lang.String name
      The name of the attack represented with a String

      • Attack

        public Attack​(java.lang.String name,
              java.util.List<ActionConfig> actionConfigs,
              Board board,
              java.util.List<Coin> cost)
        Creates a new Attack
        Parameters:
        name - String representing the name of the attack
        actionConfigs - the list of the configurations for this attack
        board - the Board this attack can be used on
        cost - the price to pay to use this attack

      • Attack

        public Attack​(Attack toCopy,
              boolean basicFirst)
        Copies an existing Attack, allowing to change basicFirst
        Parameters:
        toCopy - the Attack to copy
        basicFirst - whether the attack requires that the basic attack has already been executed

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        This method returns a String representing the name of the Attack The name is a Unique Identifier for the attack whithin a Weapon
        Returns:
        the name of the attack

      • execute

        public final void execute​(Interviewer interviewer,
                          Weapon weapon)
        Executes the attack
        Parameters:
        interviewer - the Interviewer that will be asked when there is a choice to be made
        weapon - the Weapon used to shoot

      • findStartingPoint

        private Block findStartingPoint​(Interviewer interviewer,
                                ActionConfig actionConfig,
                                Weapon weapon)
        Finds the starting point for the given action
        Parameters:
        interviewer - the Interviewer that will be asked if there is a choice to be made
        actionConfig - the current action
        weapon - the Weapon used to shoot
        Returns:
        the Block corresponding to the starting point

      • chooseSet

        private java.util.Optional<java.util.Set<Player>> chooseSet​(Interviewer interviewer,
                                                            ActionConfig actionConfig,
                                                            java.util.Set<java.util.Set<Player>> potentialTargets)
        Asks for the actual targets for the current action
        Parameters:
        interviewer - the Interviewer that will be asked if there is a choice to be made
        actionConfig - the current action
        potentialTargets - the previously calculated targets
        Returns:
        an Optional containing the chosen set of targets

        private java.util.Set<java.util.Set<java.lang.String>> mapPlayerToNickName​(java.util.Set<java.util.Set<Player>> potentialTargets)
        Maps a set of sets of players into a set of sets of strings representing their nicknames
        Parameters:
        potentialTargets - the set of sets of players to map
        Returns:
        the set of set of strings corresponding to the nicknames

      • findTargetByNickname

        private java.util.Set<Player> findTargetByNickname​(java.util.Set<java.util.Set<Player>> potentialTargets,
                                                   java.util.Set<java.lang.String> chosenNicknames)
        Finds a set of players given their nicknames
        Parameters:
        potentialTargets - the set of sets of players in which the desired set is contained
        chosenNicknames - the nicknames corresponding to the desired players
        Returns:
        the desired set of players

        protected java.util.Set<Block> getPotentialStartingPoints​(ActionConfig actionConfig,
                                                          Weapon weapon)
        Gets the potential starting points for an action
        Parameters:
        actionConfig - the current action
        weapon - the Weapon used to shoot
        Returns:
        the potential starting points, in a Set

      • getPotentialTargets

        protected java.util.Set<java.util.Set<Player>> getPotentialTargets​(Block startingPoint,
                                                                   ActionConfig actionConfig,
                                                                   Weapon weapon)
        Computes the potential targets of an attack
        Parameters:
        startingPoint - the Block from which the attack will start
        actionConfig - the current action
        weapon - the Weapon used to shoot
        Returns:
        a set containing the groups of potential targets

      • isExecutable

        protected boolean isExecutable​(Weapon weapon)
        Determines whether this attack is executable by the given weapon in the current situation
        Parameters:
        weapon - the Weapon that would be used to shoot
        Returns:
        true if the attack is executable, false if it is not

      • isValidStartingPoint

        protected boolean isValidStartingPoint​(Block sp,
                                       Weapon weapon)
        Determines whether a starting point is valid for the attack - it is valid if it can hit one or more targets
        Parameters:
        sp - the potential starting point
        weapon - the Weapon that would be used to shoot
        Returns:
        true if the starting point is valid, false if it is not

      • getCost

        public java.util.List<Coin> getCost()
        Gets the cost of the attack
        Returns:
        a list containing the coins needed to execute this attack

        Gets the action configurations
        Returns:
        the action configurations

      • basicMustBeDoneFirst

        protected boolean basicMustBeDoneFirst()
        States whether the basic attack of the weapon must be done before this attack
        Returns:
        true if the basic attack must be executed first, false otherwise
